name: Stay With Us
description:
Ever wanted to know what the dead think? Well, you can because you've just died. Get to know the other ghosts in your graveyard with the help of the grim reaper. Talk to other ghosts and find out their interests so you can keep them happy by giving them gifts. As long as they're happy you're probably fine... probably.

Learn more about the ghosts such as Neko the cat and QuizMaster McEvilGuy. Can you discern all 12 ghosts' interests within this multileveled game? 

Play Time: 15-20 minutes

Controls: WASD/Arrows Keys = Movement, Number Keys = Select Inventory, Mouse Wheel = Scroll Inventory, Space/Shift = Sprint, E = Interact,  Q = Plant. Esc = Pause

Credits:

  • Anna Breuker - Programmer & Designer
  • Ian Connors - Artist & Designer
  • Cooper Denault - Designer & Programmer
  • Caleb Kahn - Programmer & UI Design
